Class ec.e.file.EDirectoryEntry 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.file.EDirectoryEntry
public class EDirectoryEntry
extends Object
Common interface for all things located in directories, namely directories and files.

exists()
Test if the file or directory represented by this entry actually exists.
inDirectory(EDirectoryBase)
Test if this entry is in a particular directory.
isDirectory()
Test if this entry describes a directory.

exists 
  public boolean exists()
Test if the file or directory represented by this entry actually exists.
inDirectory 
  public boolean inDirectory(EDirectoryBase dir)
Test if this entry is in a particular directory.
isDirectory 
  public abstract boolean isDirectory()
Test if this entry describes a directory.
Returns:
s true=>directory, false=>file
